page.title: 08RELIGION
page.content: There are{10}churches in the area. {CHURCH OF ENGLAND:- 1.St.Swithin Church ,Bathford, notable for its{tower}which has an illuminated cross.Restored after serious fire damage in 1969.New organ installed for Â£7000. 2.St. Saviour's, Larkhall 3.St. John the Baptist, Batheaston 4.Blessed Virgin Mary, Swainswick 5.St.Nicholas, Bathampton -has{red clock which looks out over Kennet and Avon Canal. {ROMAN CATHOLIC Good Shepherd R.C.Batheaston {METHODIST 1.Bathampton 2.Batheaston {CONGREGATIONAL Batheaston {UNITED REFORM Larkhall
